The best fish types

We offer you various types of fish and shellfish to choose from, We catch it locally from the Nile, the Red Sea and the Mediterranean. Among our varieties you will find: gray mullet, sea bass, shari, Sea bream, sardines, squid, oysters, and many more.

about us

We are an Egyptian store specialized in selling fresh seafood. a team of Chefs and specialists work around the clock to get your meals Favorite seafood in the best picture and delicious taste!

We are proud to be one of the best stores in the Arab Republic of Egypt! Because we are Since our beginnings, three years ago, we managed to build a name that shined until it became A reference for experts and seafood lovers!

We offer you different types of fish and shellfish for you to choose from to catch Locally from the Nile River, the Red Sea and the Mediterranean, or we import it to you from distant or nearby seas. Among our varieties you will find: gray mullet, Sea bass, sea bream, bream, sardines, grouper, squid, oysters, Crabs, and many more to put in your hands the most delicious image and taste! Order and enjoy the most delicious marine adventure while you are at home!

our dishes

Seabream

The seabream has a rich, delicious flavor, but at the same time it is not intense Power. This small fish can be cooked whole in several ways Fillets are thin and quick to cook.

read more 60£

Salmon

Salmon is distinguished by its wonderful taste and attractive color, as it is considered A good choice for those who care about heart and brain health, and that It is rich in fatty acids, protein and omega 3.

read more 120£

Shrimp

Shrimp is very healthy, tasty and delicious, and it can be prepared in many ways and served Any way you like, you can choose the right size for your next recipe (large, medium or small size).

read more 160£
